question: List all PKS regions in genome NBC_01737.
label: Test
answer_sql_expected: SELECT r.*, bt.*, g.*, rt.*  FROM antismash.regions r  JOIN antismash.dna_sequences d  ON r.accession = d.accession  JOIN antismash.genomes g ON d.genome_id = g.genome_id  JOIN antismash.rel_regions_types rt ON r.region_id = rt.region_id  JOIN antismash.bgc_types bt ON rt.bgc_type_id = bt.bgc_type_id  WHERE g.assembly_id = 'NBC_01737'  AND bt.term ILIKE '%PKS%';
answer_summary_expected:
The genome NBC_01737 contains 5 PKS regions with the following details:
1. Region 1: Location [1505416:1546433], best hit loseolamycin A1/loseolamycin A2 with 68% similarity.
2. Region 5: Location [5772447:5884359], best hit neoabyssomicin/abyssomicin with 28% similarity.
3. Region 11: Location [8202310:8321183], best hit diazepinomicin with 75% similarity.
4. Region 20: Location [11551477:11627322], best hit azinomycin B with 68% similarity.
5. Region 21: Location [12318862:12465542], best hit BE-43547A1/A2/B1/B2/B3/C1/C2 with 30% similarity.
answer_sql_LLM:
SELECT 
    r.*, 
    bt.*, 
    g.*, 
    rt.*  
FROM 
    antismash.regions r  
    JOIN antismash.dna_sequences d ON r.accession = d.accession  
    JOIN antismash.genomes g ON d.genome_id = g.genome_id  
    JOIN antismash.rel_regions_types rt ON r.region_id = rt.region_id  
    JOIN antismash.bgc_types bt ON rt.bgc_type_id = bt.bgc_type_id  
WHERE 
    g.assembly_id = 'NBC_01737'  
    AND bt.term ILIKE '%PKS%';
answer_summary_LLM:
The genome NBC_01737 contains 5 PKS regions:

1. Region 1: [1505416:1546433], Type III polyketide, similarity 68% to loseolamycin A1/A2
2. Region 5: [5772447:5884359], Type I polyketide, similarity 28% to neoabyssomicin/abyssomicin
3. Region 11: [8202310:8321183], Type III polyketide, similarity 75% to diazepinomicin
4. Region 20: [11551477:11627322], Type I polyketide, similarity 68% to azinomycin B
5. Region 21: [12318862:12465542], Type I polyketide, similarity 30% to BE-43547A1/A2/B1/B2/B3/C1/C2
